casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 27, 2010

[Cite as 12/27/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-6370.]

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2009-1507. Berry v. Javitch, Block & Rathbone, L.L.P.

Cuyahoga App. No. 91723, 182 Ohio App.3d 795, 2009-Ohio-3067. Reported at 127 Ohio St.3d 480, 2010- Ohio-5772, 940 N.E.2d 1265. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Brown, C.J., and Froelich, J., dissent. Jeffrey E. Froelich, J., of the Second Appellate District, sitting for O’Connor, J.
